readable.title: 3272541970_ac0f1de274
readable.content: A boy is grinding a skateboard down a concrete wall . A guy on a skateboard about to do a trick A kid in a white shirt and white hat and jeans skateboards down a ramp . A rollerblader skates down a ramp with his arms in the air . The skater throws his arms into the air as he skids down the concrete wall .
